Radiocarbon in the Earth System 2017

Welcome to Radiocarbon in the Earth System 2017

The short course Radiocarbon in the Earth System will take place between September 24 to 29 at the Max Planck Institute for Biogeochemistry in Jena, Germany. In this site we will post all information related to the course such as program, presentations, code, etc.

Program

  1. | Sunday | Sep 24

    Get together
  2. | Monday | Sep 25

    Radiocarbon and the global C cycle
  3. | Tuesday | Sep 26

    The land system
  4. | Wednesday | Sep 27

    The atmosphere system
  5. | Thursday | Sep 28

    The ocean system
  6. | Friday | Sep 29

    Paleo environments and modeling

Venue

Lectures will will take place at the Lecture Hall of the Max Planck Institute for Biogechemistry, Hans-Kn√∂ll-Str. 10, Jena, Germany.
